statements: SELECT * FROM unsubscribe_requests;
SELECT id, email_address FROM unsubscribe_requests WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM unsubscribe_requests WHERE email_address = 'test@example.com';
SELECT * FROM unsubscribe_requests ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT id, email_address, request_date FROM unsubscribe_requests WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM unsubscribe_requests ORDER BY request_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, email_address FROM unsubscribe_requests WHERE email_address='example@gmail.com';
SELECT id, email_address, request_date FROM unsubscribe_requests WHERE request_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY request_date LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*), DATE_TRUNC('day', request_date) AS day FROM unsubscribe_requests GROUP BY day ORDER BY day;
SELECT id, email_address, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM request_date) AS request_month FROM unsubscribe_requests ORDER BY request_month, email_address DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM unsubscribe_requests WHERE email_address = 'test@example.com';
SELECT request_id, email_address, timestamp FROM unsubscribe_requests ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM unsubscribe_requests WHERE reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT email_address, receive_promotions FROM subscription_preferences WHERE receive_promotions = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM subscription_preferences WHERE email_address = 'user@example.com';
SELECT * FROM unsubscribe_requests WHERE email_address='john.doe@example.com';
SELECT timestamp, email_address FROM unsubscribe_requests WHERE reason='spam' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT preference_id, email_address, receive_newsletters FROM subscription_preferences WHERE receive_promotions=true ORDER BY preference_id ASC;
SELECT request_id, email_address, timestamp FROM unsubscribe_requests WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-12-31';
SELECT email_address, reason FROM unsubscribe_requests WHERE reason IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM unsubscribe_requests;
SELECT id,email FROM subscription_preferences WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT id,email,frequency FROM subscription_preferences ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT email,action,date_performed FROM subscription_history WHERE action = 'unsubscribe';
SELECT id,email,date_requested FROM unsubscribe_requests WHERE id > 5;
SELECT * FROM unsubscribe_requests WHERE id = 1;
SELECT email, date_requested FROM unsubscribe_requests WHERE email = 'test@example.com';
SELECT id, email, date_requested FROM unsubscribe_requests ORDER BY date_requested DESC;
SELECT email, COUNT(*) FROM subscription_preferences GROUP BY email HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT email, action, date_performed FROM subscription_history WHERE date_performed > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_performed ASC;
SELECT * FROM unsubscribe_requests;
SELECT request_id, email_address, request_date FROM unsubscribe_requests;
SELECT email_address, request_date, request_id FROM unsubscribe_requests;
SELECT user_id, email_frequency FROM subscription_preferences;
SELECT * FROM user_profile;
SELECT * FROM unsubscribe_requests WHERE request_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, full_name FROM user_profile ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, email_address FROM subscription_history WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT email_type, email_frequency FROM subscription_preferences WHERE email_frequency = 'Weekly';
SELECT user_id, full_name, join_date FROM user_profile WHERE join_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM EmailSubscribers WHERE subscription_preference = 'daily';
SELECT email_address, subscription_preference FROM EmailSubscribers WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
SELECT template_name, content FROM EmailTemplates WHERE template_id = 2;
SELECT request_id, email_address FROM UnsubscribeRequests WHERE unsubscribe_reason = 'spam';
SELECT * FROM SubscriptionCategories;
SELECT * FROM UnsubscribeRequests;
SELECT email_address, unsubscribe_reason FROM UnsubscribeRequests WHERE request_id = 1;
SELECT template_name, content FROM EmailTemplates WHERE template_id = 3;
SELECT subscriber_id, history_date FROM SubscriptionHistory ORDER BY history_date DESC;

SELECT email_address, action_type FROM EmailSubscribers JOIN SubscriptionHistory ON EmailSubscribers.subscriber_id = SubscriptionHistory.subscriber_id WHERE SubscriptionHistory.action_type = 'unsubscribe';
